message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $60 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $70?
Bob, I'm trying to find a fair price for both of us. $70 is still quite low for what this product offers. I can go down to $85, my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $85 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product.
